docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to Team VPE's Leaderboard Repository! This project provides an interactive framework for biomodel simulation and time series prediction. By integrating AI-driven time series models, we extend traditional biomodel simulations to forecast future states based on initial conditions.

(This repository is a work in progress..)

  • Get Started

    Kickstart your journey with VPE Leaderboard – install the PyPI package and follow an easy step-by-step guide for effortless setup.

    Get Started

  • Data

    Discover datasets integrated seamlessly into the framework for streamlined analysis and experimentation.

    Explore Data

  • Algorithms

    Discover cutting-edge algorithms designed for time series forecasting and predictive modeling.

    Explore Algorithms

  • Leaderboard

    Explore algorithmic outputs and performance metrics in the leaderboard to evaluate and compare results effortlessly.

    Explore Leaderboard

docs.title: Algorithms
docs.text:
Below is a mock table illustrating how algorithm table will be structured:

Algorithm Metric 1 Metric 2 Metric 3 ... Algo 1 0.9 0.2 0.8 ... Algo 2 0.85 0.3 0.75 ... Algo 3 0.92 0.25 0.78 ...

Each row represents a different algorithm, while columns represent different metrics. This helps to compare performance across multiple tasks.

Stay tuned for updates! 🎉

docs.title: Data
docs.text:
Below is a mock table illustrating how a data table will be structured:

Sl. No. Model Name Number of Species Number of Parameters ... 1 Model 1 15 9 ... 2 Model 2 16 5 ... 3 Model 3 23 3 ...

Each row represents a different Bio Models. Each column represents a different metrics. This enables for easy comparison of models across multiple attributes.

📢 Stay tuned for updates! 🎉

docs.title: Leaderboard
docs.text:
Below is a mock leaderboard table illustrating how algorithm performance will be structured and compared:

Rank Algorithm Name Task/Data Metric 1 Metric 2 Metric 3 ... 🥇 1 Algo 1 Task A 0.92 0.85 0.78 ... 🥈 2 Algo 2 Task A 0.90 0.80 0.75 ... 🥉 3 Algo 3 Task B 0.88 0.78 0.72 ...

Each row represents a different algorithm ranked by performance. Each column represents different evaluation metrics

📢 Stay tuned for updates as we refine the leaderboard! 🎉

docs.title: 🚀 Getting Started with VPE Leaderboard
docs.text: Welcome to VPE Leaderboard, a platform for benchmarking and evaluating different algorithms across various tasks and datasets.

docs.title: 📌 What is VPE Leaderboard?
docs.text: VPE Leaderboard is designed to: - Compare the performance of different algorithms on specific tasks. - Provide a centralized platform for benchmarking results. - Facilitate collaboration and improvements in algorithm development.

docs.title: Coming Soon...
docs.text: We are working on something exciting! Stay tuned for updates.
